summary:
Accomplished Senior Mobile Developer with 9+ years of experience in native and cross-platform mobile development. Expert in creating high-performance, secure mobile applications with a focus on payment systems and enterprise solutions. Core competencies include:

• Technical Leadership: Led mobile development teams and architecture decisions
• Native Development: Advanced Android (Kotlin, Jetpack) and iOS (Swift, SwiftUI) implementation
• Cross-Platform: Expert in Flutter development and architecture (BLoC, Provider)
• Payment Systems: Specialized in secure payment processing and PCI-DSS compliance
• Performance Optimization: Advanced mobile optimization and profiling techniques
• Security: Implementation of secure authentication, encryption, and biometrics
• UI/UX: Modern mobile design patterns, animations, and Material/Cupertino
• Mobile Architecture: Clean Architecture, MVVM, MVI patterns

Key Achievements:
• Developed MPOS applications processing $50M+ monthly transactions
• Reduced app size by 40% while improving performance
• Created cross-platform solutions reducing development time by 60%
• Published multiple successful apps on Play Store and App Store

workExperience.title: Senior Mobile Developer
workExperience.description: Lead mobile architect for payment processing applications, focusing on security and user experience.
achievements: Led development of PTT Akıllı Esnaf mobile platform, successfully onboarding 50K+ merchants
Created cross-platform payment solution using Flutter reducing development time by 60%
Implemented biometric authentication and encryption for secure transactions
Reduced app size by 40% through optimization techniques
Achieved 4.8+ rating on both Play Store and App Store
Developed MPOS application processing $50M+ monthly transactions

Optimized mobile app performance improving response time by 40%
